description:
mrepo - Mirroring and building RPM repositories

Author: Dag Wieers

Dag Wieers holds the very first presentation about a tool he started 6 years ago that is able to synchronise RPM repositories, even from RHN (Red Hat Enterprise Linux) and YOU (YaST Online Update) repositories on a single server for different architectures and versions. Since it simplifies maintenance cross-distribution and can be used for managing repositories, reporting updates or providing updated network installation media. It is used internally by companies, including HP, SGI and many others.
title: mrepo - Mirroring and building RPM repositories
